titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Electrical Engineering, Yale University, Records
Department of Electrical Engineering, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:27

did.unittitle: Department of Electrical Engineering, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, annual reports, financial records, and subject files documenting scholarships and awards, loans and funding, research projects, and personnel of the Yale School of Engineering's Department of Electrical Engineering.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 23-E (YRG 23-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the School of Engineering.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Electrical Engineering, Yale University, Records (RU 55). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, annual reports, financial records, and subject files documenting scholarships and awards, loans and funding, research projects, and personnel of the Yale School of Engineering's Department of Electrical Engineering.

did.unittitle: American Institute of Electrical Engineers (A.I.E.E.) Student Branch

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are restricted until Jan 1, 2043.
